com.epoch.session

Class CrossCourseReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.session.CrossCourseReport

  • public final class CrossCourseReport
extends Object
    For storing student response results from different courses.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Map<String,LinkedHashMap<Integer,LinkedHashMap<int[],LinkedHashMap<Integer,EvalResult>>>> allResults
      Contains map of student results by Q number by assignment number by course number by student login ID.

    • Method Detail

      • addResult

        public void addResult(String studentId,
                      int courseId,
                      int[] hwIdAndNum,
                      int qNum,
                      EvalResult result)
        Adds a result to the report.
        Parameters:
        studentId - login ID of the student
        courseId - course ID number
        hwIdAndNum - ID number and 1-based serial number of the assignment
        qNum - 1-based serial number of the question in the assignment
        result - the evaluation result

      • getStudentIds

        public List<String> getStudentIds()
        Gets the login IDs of the students.
        Returns:
        list of login IDs in the order they were added to the map

      • getCourseIds

        public List<Integer> getCourseIds(String studentId)
        Gets the course ID numbers of a student for which there are results.
        Parameters:
        studentId - login ID of the student
        Returns:
        list of course IDs in the order they were added to the map

      • getHWIdsAndNums

        public List<int[]> getHWIdsAndNums(String studentId,
                                   int courseId)
        Gets the assignment IDs and numbers in a course of a student for which there are results.
        Parameters:
        studentId - login ID of the student
        courseId - course ID number
        Returns:
        list of assignment IDs and numbers in the order they were added to the map

      • getQNums

        public List<Integer> getQNums(String studentId,
                              int courseId,
                              int[] hwIdAndNum)
        Gets the question numbers in an assignment in a course of a student for which there are results.
        Parameters:
        studentId - login ID of the student
        courseId - course ID number
        hwIdAndNum - assignment ID and number
        Returns:
        list of question numbers in the order they were added to the map

      • getResult

        public EvalResult getResult(String studentId,
                            int courseId,
                            int[] hwIdAndNum,
                            int qNum)
        Gets the result of a student's response to a question.
        Parameters:
        studentId - login ID of the student
        courseId - course ID number
        hwIdAndNum - assignment ID and number
        qNum - 1-based serial number of the question in the assignment
        Returns:
        result of student response

      • getHW

        public Assgt getHW(int hwId)
            throws DBException
        Read assignment description with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        hwId - assignment ID number
        Returns:
        an assignment description
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Gets if no results were found.
        Returns:
